alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 12:14AM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Ada, southwestern Elmore and northeastern Owyhee Counties through 115 AM MDT... At 1213 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Boise Stage Stop to Big Foot Butte. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Boise Stage Stop around 1220 AM MDT. Cinder Cone Butte around 1240 AM MDT. Mountain Home Air Force Base and C J Strike Reservoir around 100 AM MDT. Mountain Home around 110 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
